company_personnel_news.news: Malpa Games, led by Head of User Acquisition Aleksandr Sergeev and User Acquisition Manager Fedor Krivoblotski, collaborated with Unity Ads to implement event optimization campaigns. This strategy resulted in a 40% increase in day 14 retention rates compared to return on ad spend (ROAS) campaigns.
Malpa Games released an update for their game 'Word Pizza – Search Words' on October 19, 2023, enhancing the gaming experience for players.
On September 8, 2023, Malpa Games updated 'Word Search & Find Puzzle,' adding detailed tutorials, improving game design, enhancing animations, and fixing bugs.
Malpa Games' titles 'Word Search Sea' and 'Word Pizza' each surpassed 20 million downloads, generating over $10 million in revenue.
Malpa Games Ltd, a Cyprus-based company, was registered on June 15, 2022, and remains active.

company_news.news: Malpa Games Ltd released a new mobile game titled 'Sky Words: Word Game' on the Google Play Store. The game has received positive feedback, achieving a 4.8-star rating from users.
Malpa Games Ltd launched 'Word Spells: Word Puzzles', a new addition to their portfolio of word games. The app has garnered a 4.8-star rating, indicating favorable reception.
The company introduced 'Word Search - Evolution Puzzle', which has been well-received with a 4.7-star rating on the Google Play Store.
Malpa Games Ltd released 'Word Pizza - Word Games', adding to their collection of word-based mobile games. The app boasts a 4.9-star rating, reflecting strong user satisfaction.
The company launched 'Word Search Sea: Word Puzzle', which has achieved a 4.8-star rating, indicating positive user feedback.

final_summary.summary:
### Company Details
Malpa Games Ltd is a Cyprus-based mobile game publisher founded in 2022, headquartered at Spyrou Kyprianou Avenue, Limassol Municipality, Limassol, Cyprus. The company focuses on casual mobile games and offers services including localization, monetization, app store optimization, production, user acquisition, and game support. Notable titles include 'Word Search Sea' and 'Word Pizza'—both exceeding 20 million downloads and $10 million in revenue. Malpa Games is led by Director Chrysoula Tzagkidou. The company has collaborated with Unity Ads to achieve significant improvements in user retention.  
([signalhire.com](https://www.signalhire.com/companies/malpa-games?utm_source=openai), [malpagames.com](https://malpagames.com/?utm_source=openai), [is.com](https://www.is.com/community/case-studies/malpa-games-unity-ads-event-optimization/?utm_source=openai), [dnb.com](https://www.dnb.com/business-directory/company-profiles.malpa_games_ltd.bb5c77b6ba4b0553dfa99ab427277e0a.html?utm_source=openai))

### Key Personnel
- Aleksandr Sergeev — Head of User Acquisition
- Fedor Krivoblotski — User Acquisition Manager
- Chrysoula Tzagkidou — Director
